meanings: pending instructions from the ruling office

vlive.korean: 평소 한국에 있을 때요? When I am in Korea? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
혼자 있을 때 저 그냥... When I am by myself, I just... 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🐰🎂♥️
vlive.english: When I am by myself, I just...

vlive.korean: 신기하죠? 그래서 동생 배에 있을 때 맨날 제가 그 뭐지? Cool, right? When my brother was in my mother's stomach, what is it? 듣기 View video ITZY : 깜짝리아브이 기다렸찌~?✌️
vlive.english: Cool, right? When my brother was in my mother's stomach, what is it?

vlive.korean: 리노 형 들어가 있을 때... When he is in the room. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 아기다리고기다리던공공즈😁
vlive.english: When he is in the room.

vlive.korean: 가만히 있을 때 귀여울 때가... and when he stays still. 듣기 View video NCT : 오늘도 뚠뚠 퇴근을 뚠뚠

examples.korean: He feels more confident on home turf. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 홈그라운드에 있을 때 더 자신감을 느낀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He feels more confident on home turf. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was released on bail pending further inquiries. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 추후 조사가 있을 때까지 보석으로 석방되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was released on bail pending further inquiries. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The submarine is invulnerable to attack while at sea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 잠수함은 바다 속에 있을 때는 난공불락이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The submarine is invulnerable to attack while at sea. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The organization certainly prospered under his stewardship. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 조직은 분명히 그의 관리하에 있을 때 번창했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The organization certainly prospered under his stewardship. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Only do these more difficult stretches when you are warmed up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이들 난이도가 높은 스트레칭은 반드시 준비운동이 충분히 되어 있을 때에만 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Only do these more difficult stretches when you are warmed up. Add to Wordbook
